publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.incipit: ተግሣጽ፡ፍካሬ፡ ዘጻድቃን፡ ወዘኃጥአን። መዝሙር፡ ዘዳዊት፡ ሃሌ፡ ሉያ። ፩ ፩ ብፁዕ፡ ብእሲ፡ ዘኢሖረ፡ በምክረ፡ ረሲዓን። ወዘኢቆመ፡ ውስተ፡ ፍኖተ፡ ኃጥአን።
ትንቢት፡ በእንተ፡ ክርስቶስ። ለምንት፡ አንገለጉ፡ አሕዛብ። ወሕዝብኒ፡ ነበቡ፡ ከንቶ።
እግዚኦ፡ ሚበዝኁ፡ እለ፡ ይሣቅዩኒ። ፫ ብዙኃን፡ ቆሙ ላዕሌየ።
፬፡ ሶበ፡ ጸዋዕክዎ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ሰምዓኒ፡ ጽድቅየ፡ ወእምንዳቤየ፡ አርኀበ፡ ሊተ።

incipit.hi: ፯ እግዚኦ፡ አምላኪየ፡ ብከ፡ ተወከልኩ፡ ወኢትግድፈኒ፡
፰፡ እግዚኦ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ጥቀ፡ ተሰብሐ፡ ስምክ፡ በኵሉ፡ ምድር፡

msItem.note: The beginning of the text is missing.

supportDesc.foliation: Foliated by the cataloguer in the right lower corner. Foliation error after : one leaf not foliated (fol. 74 bis).
supportDesc.condition: Stains of water and dirt throughout the manuscript. First two quires have been reattached to the binding with a green thread. Textile inlays of the binding are almost lost. The leather cover of the binding is rubbed off and damaged by insects.

handNote.seg: First one or two lines in the beginning of the text and text sections; punctuation marks; name of God, Mary, and angels; single letters and words.

item.desc: The name of the owner and the scribe has been erased.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered with tooled leather.

history.acquisition: The manuscript was acquired in Ethiopia in 1963-1966.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

revisionDesc.change: Created entry, added physical description and content.
